reason: UNDEFINED TERM: (A_0)_sa is used without explicit definition. From context (section 1), it appears to mean the self-adjoint elements of A_0 = C<g_1,...,g_n>, but this is never formally stated. The notation '_sa' needs explicit definition: Does (A_0)_sa := {a in A_0 : a* = a}? This definition is critical since the entire lemma depends on what (A_0)_sa means.
